General.Name: Sparc Technologies Ltd
General.Description: Sparc Technologies Limited manufactures and sells graphene-based technologies in Australia. The company develops graphene-based additives for marine and protective coating markets. It also engages in the renewable energy and construction material businesses. The company was incorporated in 1984 and is headquartered in Kent Town, Australia.
General.Address: 51 Rundle Street, Kent Town, SA, Australia, 5067

2.Name: Mr. Adrien Michele Wing B.Acc, B.Bus, C.P.A., CPA
